title: 45percent Introductory Offer on Bonnington
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bsp_5428.png)

The Bonnington family, offered in three weights and three widths represents a further developed display variant of Greater Albion's Bonning family. We're offering it at a 45% discount on [Myfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052845/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bonnington/) for the first few weeks of its life.
author: Rasendyll
